text: William Alan Hawkshaw (27 March 1937 â€“ 16 October 2021) was a British composer. He wrote many theme tunes including Grange Hill and Countdown. He was an arranger and pianist and performed with the studio group Love De-Luxe with "Here Comes That Sound Again" in 1979. Hawkshaw died of pneumonia at a London hospital on 16 October 2021, aged 84.Alan Hawkshaw: Grange Hill and Countdown composer dies aged 84 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British composers Category:British songwriters Category:British keyboardists Category:British rock musicians Category:British pop musicians Category:Musicians from Yorkshire Category:Writers from Leeds Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in London
title: Alan Hawkshaw
